description.value:
Wielded by wealthy Taldan knights against the Goroth Lodge, this +1 striking returning hatchet has an axe head resembling a roaring lion's head.

Activate—Slash and Burn r (manipulate)

Trigger You critically succeed at a Strike against a plant

Effect The weapon's etchings pulse with green energy, as it tears through bark, leaf, and wood. The clear cutter's axe deals an additional @Damage[1d10[persistent,fire]] damage to the plant.

Activate—Mow Down 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You hurl the axe horizontally, sending it flying through the air in a wild, whirling cyclone. The axe flies in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] around you, eliminating all non-magical undergrowth and any resulting difficult terrain, cover, and concealment in area. It attempts to counteract one magical effect that affects a plant in the area (counteract [[/r 1d20+20 #Counteract]]{+20}). Plant creatures in the area take @Damage[5d6[slashing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic] save). As the axe finishes its circuit, it returns to your hand.
